full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LAM RIM BSDUS DON GYI BSHAD LUNG KHYAB BDAG RJE BTZUN BLA MA'I GSUNG BSHAD RAGS BSDUS ZIN BRIS SU BKOD PA NGO MTSAR PADMA DKAR PO'I 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI NGOS RANG GI KHU BO MKHYEN DBANG PHYUG RGYA NAG MI SNA MKHAN PO TSA BA YONGS 'DZIN ^ SPRUL SKU RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS KYI GSUNG GIS BSKUL MA MDZAD PA LTAR, ^ RJE BLA MA RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO MNYES BZHIN RJES SU BZUNG BA'I ^ YE SHES THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO'I MING CAN GYIS RANG LO NYI SHU LA BRIS PA YIN PAS DAG MIN GYI SBYAR BA NI, MKHAS PA @016B CHEN PO PHYOGS 'DIR CUNG ZAD 'DRIS PA RNAMS KYIS MDZAD DGOS YOD DE CES KYANG ZHU BA LAGS SO,, ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: YE SHES THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO'I MING CAN,
